description.narrative: Emergency and Disaster Risk Management, which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Effective and efficient Programme management and operations support to Programme delivery

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Disaster affected and at-risk men, women, girls and boys received lifesaving supplies, emergency cash top-up transfers, behaviour change messages and technical support, as well as support mechanisms for the prevention and response to all forms of violence, including GBV with specific focus on sexual exploitation and abuse, through UNICEF support. | Status:Met | As-of Date:20/12/2018

title.narrative: Office Emergency Response plan ready, tested and operational within the framework of the CCC
